pr_title: fix(telemetry): do no crash when TelemetryJob can't lock internal tables

timeline.message: fix(telemetry): do no crash when TelemetryJob can't lock internal tables

timeline.bodyText:
when you set enabled=false just return out of the method to avoid tripping over second table and also peppering the rest of the code with conditionals.
When coming out of the method like that though ensure that all writers are released.
For example when first writer lock succeeds and second fails - first writer is never released.
timeline.author: bluestreak01

replies.bodyText:
"return out of the method"
--> done
"For example when first writer lock succeeds and second fails - first writer is never released."
--> this is not the case, the writer is released.
replies.author: mpsq
